name: Imitation
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You craft shadow magic into a potent illusion taking the form of any tier 1 or 2 spell without the Concentration tag, a Forbidden tag, or a range of Self, and unleash it. This works similarly to the chosen spell, except that it uses this spell's tags, and all saving throws are changed to Knowledge saving throws.

A creature that succeeds on any saving throw caused by the illusory spell takes no damage and ignores all effects of the spell until it ends.
